title: 75/147. Observer status for the Small Island Developing States Dock (SIDS DOCK) in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/75/147
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
22 December 2020 
 
20-17235 (E)    291220 
*2017235* 
 
 
Seventy-fifth session 
Agenda item 180 
Observer status for the Small Island Developing States 
Dock (SIDS DOCK) in the General Assembly  
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 15 December 2020 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/75/448, para. 8)] 
 
 
 75/147. Observer status for the Small Island Developing States Dock 
(SIDS DOCK) in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the Small 
Island Developing States Dock (SIDS DOCK), 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the Small Island Developing States Dock (SIDS DOCK) 
to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of 
observer;  
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
45th plenary meeting 
15 December 2020

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Small Island Developing States Dock (SIDS DOCK) to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
